topic.title: lib-AtomSphere Edition Info
topic.shortdesc: This library contains notes that appear in topics related to features available in certain editions of the application.

body.note: If you do not see a particular part of the user interface that is described in this documentation, it is probably because it is not available in the edition that you are using or it is an add-on feature that you did not purchase.

This shape is part of the Advanced Workflow and is therefore available only in the Professional, Professional Plus, Enterprise, and Enterprise Plus Editions of . Contact your account representative for more information.
This feature is available only in the Professional, Professional Plus, Enterprise, and Enterprise Plus Editions of . Contact your account representative for more information.

This feature is part of Advanced User Security, which is available in the Enterprise and Enterprise Plus Editions, and as an add-on to the Professional and Professional Plus Editions. Consult with your account representative to have this functionality enabled.
The Trading Partner shape, EDI, and B2B solutions are in their own edition. To have these capabilities enabled in your account, contact your account representative.
